Detailed Description

Group class.

Used to manipulate groups.

Definition at line 127 of file Group.php.

Boo_Group::setPermissions ( $  permissions  ) 

Group permissions.

Permissions are simmilar to GNU/Linux:

  • 1 = --x
  • 2 = -w-
  • 3 = -wx
  • 4 = r--
  • 5 = r-x
  • 6 = rw-
  • 7 = rwx
Parameters:
int $permissions The permissions.
Returns:
bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
Todo:
Fix permisions.
